Second best Counter-Strike game to date.

This game is absolute trash now. Top of the competitive league are all bots that pay lower ranks to stay silver so they can keep their rank at the top, you try to solo queue, you end up going against people who are all queued together, clearly some of them are cheating, it's silver and you're playing like it's eagle..... This entire game is a scam. After years of supporting CS:GO.... The skins should be removed from market, this game should not allow itself to scam its users... you only get good skins if your rank is good.... as proven time and time again, when i was eagle, i got tons of worthwhile skins, now that i'm silver and can't get out, i get trash. So these kids not only have taken advantage of the game, they use it to take advantage of the market. Most of the CS:GO skin traders, got their skins from getting boosted... which means either smurfs or cheaters helped them. So much toxicity, i report people every game for stuff i have to mute half the community.... The least CS:GO could do is actually punish players for trolling. it's not hard to get on a discord with 100 people on it, all queue for games and have the "friend" on the enemy team share screen. The idea that some one can get a 5000$ skin, promotes this type of abuse. This needs to stop. Now.
